name: photo-of-the-day-the-mondrian-wall
title: Photo Of The Day: The Mondrian Wall
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
One of our favorite parts about digging through the Nashvillest Flickr pool every day are all the pictures that make us go, “Wait, that’s Nashville?” Maybe we just don’t get out enough, but we’ve never seen this wall before and completely fell in love with this contribution from hereontheroad.

You guys have been dropping such incredible photos into our pool that we’re having some serious trouble deciding which ones to put up every day. So if you don’t see yours up here right away, relax, we’ll catch up with you. It’s a problem we’re really happy to have.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Donâ€™t worry- Weâ€™ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with â€œNashvillestâ€ if youâ€™re feeling lazy.
